verses.kjv: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.
verses.ct: Vindicate me, LORD, because I have lived with integrity. I have put my trust in the LORD without wavering.

verses.kjv: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
verses.ct: Test me, LORD, and put me on trial; examine my deepest thoughts and my heart.

verses.kjv: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
verses.ct: Your faithful love is always in front of me, and I have lived according to your truth.

verses.kjv: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.
verses.ct: I don't spend my time with worthless people, and I won't associate with hypocrites.

verses.kjv: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
verses.ct: I despise the company of those who do evil, and I refuse to sit among the wicked.

verses.kjv: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O LORD:
verses.ct: I wash my hands to show my innocence, and I walk around your altar, LORD,

verses.kjv: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.
verses.ct: so that I can proclaim my gratitude out loud and tell about all your amazing deeds.

verses.kjv: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
verses.ct: LORD, I love the house where you live, the place where your glory resides.

verses.kjv: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
verses.ct: Don't sweep my soul away along with sinners, or my life along with murderersâ€”

verses.kjv: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
verses.ct: people whose hands are always scheming, whose right hands are full of bribes.

verses.kjv: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
verses.ct: But I will live with integrity. Rescue me and show me mercy.

verses.kjv: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the LORD.
verses.ct: My feet stand on solid ground; in the gatherings of your people I will praise the LORD.
